name: ttsreader
description: Text to Speech wrapper, player and helpers for the web-speech-api speech synthesis

scripts.build: mkdir build; browserify browserify.js > build/bundle.js; terser build/bundle.js -c drop_console=true > build/bundle.min.js; git add .; npm version patch -m "Release %s" -f; git push;
scripts.prepublishOnly: mkdir build; browserify browserify.js > build/bundle.js; terser build/bundle.js -c drop_console=true > build/bundle.min.js; git add .; npm version patch -m "Release %s" -f; git push;

author: Ronen Rabinovici
